section.title: Style the Topics Depending on Their Role
section.p:
There might be cases when you need to distinguish between certain types of topics that have different roles in your publication:
Preface
Notice
Abstract
Copyright These are referenced from the DITA map by specialized topicref elements, with different class attribute values.

The class attribute values are then passed by the transformation process onto the corresponding topic elements from the merged map content. For example, a topic that was referenced by a preface map element now has a " bookmap/preface " value in its topicrefclass attribute:
section.codeblock: <topic class="- topic/topic " id="unique_1" topicrefclass="- map/topicref bookmap/preface " .. > ... </topic>
section.p: This can be used to match and apply various styling choices, or even a particular page layout:
